shielding.label: Shielding
shielding.desc: Choose a friendly target within 10m to receive +1 spell armour. Adds an additional +1 for each additional rank above 1

blink.label: Blink
blink.desc: Immediately move to any spot within range of your movement and line of sight. Can be used while Slowed but not Rooted. This does not provoke an Attack of Opportunity. Adds 1 point of movement range for each rank above 1.

telekinesis.label: Telekinesis
telekinesis.desc: The caster can lift, with the power of their mind, a creature or object under 200KG. Enemy creatures must make an Strength Saving Throw or be lifted and slammed into the ground taking 1d4+INT Blunt damage and become Knocked down. On save success they take half damage and are not knocked down. Does an additional 1d4 damage for each rank above 1.

summonlight.label: Summon Light
summonlight.desc: Summon a magical light which follows the caster for up to 1 hour. Can be dismissed by the caster at any time.

firebolt.label: Fire Bolt
firebolt.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within 10m. On hit they take 1d8+INT Fire damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 1.

arcanemissiles.label: Arcane Missiles
arcanemissiles.desc: Fire a number of missiles equal to your Intelligence, each missile hitting random nearby enemies for 1d4 Arcane damage. Does an additional 1 damage per missile for each rank above 1.

burninghands.label: Burning Hands
burninghands.desc: Spray fire in a cone area in front of you with a range of 3m. All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 2d6+INT Fire damage. On save success they take half damage. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

openlock.label: Open Lock
openlock.desc: Choose a target that is locked. If that target is locked by mundane means, it is immediately unlocked. If the target is locked by magical means, the lock spell is suppressed for the duration. This spell creates a loud humming sound.

locateobject.label: Locate Object
locateobject.desc: You can attempt to locate an object familiar to you. If the object is within 1000 metres and not blocked by magical means, you will sense the general direction of the item. For the item to be classes as familiar, you must have seen it before from been within 10m.

swap.label: Swap
swap.desc: Instantly swap places with another friendly character within 10m. This does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

eyeofzom.label: Eye of Zomm
eyeofzom.desc: Summon a floating eye with a speed of 10 which you can control. For the duration your vision is that of the eye, leaving you incapacitated at your current location.

magicsword.label: Magic Sword
magicsword.desc: Summon a sword made of pure arcane energy that only you can wield for the duration. It has a +1 modifier to Attack and does 2d4+INT+1 Arcane damage. Gains +1 attack and +1 damage for each rank above 2.

arcanelock.label: Arcane Lock
arcanelock.desc: You cast a magical lock on a door, window, gate or chest which prevents anyone from opening it other than you and anyone you designate.

summonimp.label: Summon Imp
summonimp.desc: Call forth a small imp who has 3d6 (11) health, 0 armour, 1 magic reduction, 15 dodge, an attack of +4 with a range of 5m with does doing 1d6+3 Fire damage. The imp has an additional 1d6 health and 1 damage for each rank above 2.

fogcloud.label: Fog Cloud
fogcloud.desc: You summon a fog cloud at a point within 10m. The cloud expands to cover a 3m cube, obscuring the area.

detectmagic.label: Detect Magic
detectmagic.desc: You become generally aware of any magic effects within 10m.

whisper.label: Whisper
whisper.desc: You concentrate on someone you have met before for a few seconds. If the target is on the same world, is not dead or unconscious and there is no magic blocking the effect, you are able to directly send a short whispered message which they will hear within their mind. Unwilling targets make a Charisma Saving Throw vs the spell DC to see whether the message is blocked.

frostnova.label: Frost Nova
frostnova.desc: All creatures within 2m of you must make an Constitution Saving Throw, if they fail they take 3d6+INT Ice damage and are Rooted. On save success they take half damage and are not rooted.

icebolt.label: Ice Bolt
icebolt.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within 10m. On hit they take 3d8+INT Ice damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

fireball.label: Fireball
fireball.desc: Choose an area 3mx3m within 10m. All characters within the area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 2d8+INT Fire damage. On success they take half damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

invisibility.label: Invisibility
invisibility.desc: Your target magically vanishes from sight for the duration. Only creatures with 'see invisible' will be able to see them. Performing any aggressive action will remove the invisibility. For each rank above 2, this can affect 1 additional target.

flameshield.label: Flame Shield
flameshield.desc: Engulf an ally in protective flames for the duration. Any characters hitting that target in melee combat take 3d4+INT Fire damage. Does an additional 1d4 damage for each rank above 3

cancelmagic.label: Cancel Magic
cancelmagic.desc: Remove a single magical effect on a target within 10m (works for both beneficial effects on enemies, and negative effects on allies). May affects an additional magical effect for each rank above 3.

flamingsword.label: Flaming Sword
flamingsword.desc: Engulf a weapon within reach with flames, adding 1d6+INT Fire damage to that weapon for the duration. Increases by 1d6 damage for each rank above 3.

dimensionaldoor.label: Dimensional Door
dimensionaldoor.desc: The caster creates a dimensional hole for the duration at their current location and another location within 100m that they can either see or visualise. The hole allows anyone to travel through and can be dismissed by the caster at any time.

summonelemental.label: Summon Elemental
summonelemental.desc: Summon an elemental of your choice (fire or ice), the elemental has 5d8+10 health, 6 speed, 20 dodge and does 2d8+INT damage (of the elemental type). The Fire elemental has a permanent rank 3 Flame Shield. The Ice version can cast a rank 3 Icy Grasp once with the same DC as the caster.

summonfeast.label: Summon Feast
summonfeast.desc: Conjure a great selection of food for up to 10 people. Anyone who consumes the food during a Short or Long Rest gains +2 to all saving throws and immunity to Fear for 12 hours.

identify.label: Identify
identify.desc: You instantly learn the magical properties of a magical item you are touching. If the item is not magical, the spell will have no effect.

chokingcloud.label: Choking Cloud
chokingcloud.desc: Create a cloud of choking gas at a target location of size 3mx3m, giving all creatures within -1 to attack and suffering 1d4 damage when starting their turn within the cloud.

icygrasp.label: Icy Grasp
icygrasp.desc: Touch a creature within melee range, that creature must make a Strength Saving Throw or take 3d6+INT Ice damage and be encased in ice, Stunned. On save success they take half damage and are not stunned. They must make a Strength Saving Throw at the start of their turn to see if they break free. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 3.

mirrorimage.label: Mirror Image
mirrorimage.desc: Create a number of identical copies of yourself equal to your Intelligence, confusing enemy creatures. Each enemy attacking you must roll 1d20, on 10 or below their attack will target a mirror image. Images die after taking any damage.

scry.label: Scry
scry.desc: Using a Scrying Gem, you can focus on a creature or location you are familiar with and be presented with a present vision of that target. If the target is a creature, it must make a Spirit Saving Throw to see whether it resists the scry.

teleport.label: Teleport
teleport.desc: Instantly transports the caster to a chosen previously visited location in the world.

levitate.label: Levitate
levitate.desc: You touch a willing creature, causing it to levitate up to 1m off the ground and can move around freely for the duration.

sleep.label: Sleep
sleep.desc: Select a point within 10m, causing 5d8 health worth of creatures within a 3m cube originating at the chosen point to fall unconscious. For each rank above 1, this spell affects an additional 2d8 health worth of creatures.

seeinvisible.label: See Invisible
seeinvisible.desc: Your target is able to see invisible creatures for up to 1 hour.

blizzard.label: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Choose a target area of size 3m x 3m within 10m, summoning a storm. All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 5d8+INT Ice damage. On save success it does half damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 4.

chainlightning.label: Chain Lightning
chainlightning.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a creature within 10m. On hit the creature takes 3d8+INT Energy damage. The lightning then bounces to up to 3 other enemy targets, making a Spell Attack on each and doing 2d8 Energy damage. If one of the attacks misses then the chain ends. Each hit does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 4.

blur.label: Blur
blur.desc: Choose a target friendly character, that character becomes a blurred image for the duration, causing all attacking characters to roll with disadvantage when attacking that character.

crystallize.label: Crystallize
crystallize.desc: Coat yourself in hard crystal, gaining 4d6+INT temporary health. While you have this temporary health you are considered Stunned.

openportal.label: Open Portal
openportal.desc: You can transport yourself up to 9 other characters you are touching to any previously visited location.

openrift.label: Open Rift
openrift.desc: You can open a rift when at a rift tear location. The rift lasts for up to 1 hour and can be dismissed at any time by you.

arcanegreatsword.label: Arcane Greatsword
arcanegreatsword.desc: Conjure a huge sword made of pure arcane energy that only you can wield for the duration. The sword requires both hands, has a +6 modifier to attack and does 2d8+INT+6 Arcane damage.

disintegrate.label: Disintegrate
disintegrate.desc: Create a beam of devastating energy originating at the caster and 10m in length. Each character in the line must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 3d8+INT Arcane damage and 3d8+INT Fire damage. On save success the damage is halved.

callmeteor.label: Call Meteor
callmeteor.desc: Calls down a burning meteor from the sky on a target area 3mx3m. Any characters within the area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take take 5d6+INT Fire damage and 5d6+INT Blunt damage. On save success the damage is halved.

protection.label: Protection
protection.desc: Grant a friendly target a bonus to any Saving Throws equal to your Spirit for the duration. For each rank above 1 it can apply to an additional target.

heal.label: Heal
heal.desc: Heal a target within 10m for 1d6+SPI health. Increases by 1d6 for each rank above 1.

blessing.label: Blessing
blessing.desc: Grant a friendly target a bonus to all Attack Rolls equal to your Spirit for the duration. For each rank above 1 it can apply to an additional target.

curepoison.label: Cure Poison
curepoison.desc: Purge a single poison from the target character. May purge an additional poison for each rank above 1.

weakeningword.label: Weakening Word
weakeningword.desc: All enemies within earshot must make a Spirit Saving Throw, on failure they are weakened, forcing their next attack roll to be made with Disadvantage

holybolt.label: Holy Bolt
holybolt.desc: Make a Spell Attack vs a target within 10m, on hit deals 1d6+SPI damage. Deals an additional 1d6 damage against undead or demons. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

symbol.label: Symbol
symbol.desc: Mark a friendly target within 10m with a holy symbol, granting them 1d6+SPI temporary health. Increases by 1 for each rank above 2.

protection.label: Shielding
protection.desc: Grant a friendly target +1 armour against any attacks for the duration. Increases by 1 armour for each rank above 2.

focus.label: Focus
focus.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m Advantage on any Checks for the duration. For each rank above 2 it can apply to an additional target.

calm.label: Calm
calm.desc: Calm a target, removing any Fear and granting you Advantage on any Persuasion checks against that character. Unwilling targets must make a Charisma Saving Throw to attempt to resist the affect.

curedisease.label: Cure Disease
curedisease.desc: Purge a single disease from the target character. May purge an additional disease for each rank above 2.

flashheal.label: Flash Heal
flashheal.desc: Heal a target within 10m for 1d4+SPI health. Increases by 1d4 for each rank above 2.

turnundead.label: Turn Undead
turnundead.desc: A target undead within 10m must make a Spirit Saving Throw. On save failure deals 2d8+SPI Light damage and the target is Stunned. On success it just deals half damage and no stun. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

beamoflight.label: Beam of Light
beamoflight.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target and any targets in that line, on hit deals 2d8+SPI Light damage to each target in the line. Does an additional 1d8 damage from each rank above 2.

resistance.label: Resistance
resistance.desc: Pick one type of damage (Blunt, Slashing, Piercing, Arcane, Fire, Poison, Ice, Mind, Light, Energy, or Dark). That character now has Resistance to that type of damage for 10 minutes. For each rank above 3, an additional target can be affected by the spell.

revive.label: Revive
revive.desc: Choose a character to resurrect who has been dead for less than 1 minute. Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. The DC increases by 1 for each time the character has been previously resurrected (including failed attempts). Other characters may assist in various forms (making additional checks to lower the DC). Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

cancelmagic.label: Cancel Magic
cancelmagic.desc: Remove a single magical effect on a target within 10m (works for both beneficial effects on enemies, and negative effects on allies). May affects an additional magical effect for each rank above 3.

circleofhealing.label: Circle of Healing
circleofhealing.desc: All friendly characters within 2m are healed for 1d8+SPI health. Increases by 1d8 for each rank above 3.

bountifullight.label: Bountiful Light
bountifullight.desc: All allies within 5m are blessed with light for 1 hour. Any heals on them now heal for the full die amount and do not need to be rolled.

holyword.label: Holy Word
holyword.desc: All enemies within earshot must make a Spirit Saving Throw. On a failed save they take 4d8+SPI Light damage. Deals an additional 1d8 to undead or demons.

spiritguardians.label: Spirit Guardians
spiritguardians.desc: Summon 3 protective spirits around yourself which each add 1 to your dodge. When you take damage 1 spirit is removed.

flashoflight.label: Flash of Light
flashoflight.desc: All enemies that can see you are blinded by a flash of light, they must make a Constitution Saving Throw or be Blinded.

trueresurrection.label: True Resurrection
trueresurrection.desc: Choose a character to resurrect who has been dead for less than 1 year. Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. The DC increases by 1 for each time the character has been previously resurrected (including failed attempts). Other characters may assist in various forms. Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

angelsfury.label: Angel's Fury
angelsfury.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target enemy within 10m, deals 5d8+SPI light damage. Does an additional 2d8 damage to demons and undead.

vengeance.label: Vengeance
vengeance.desc: Grant divine protection to a target, the next fatal damage they would take is ignored and they can immediately make an attack against the attacking enemy.

strengthofthebear.label: Strength of the Bear
strengthofthebear.desc: Grant a friendly target additional Strength equal to your Spirit for their next check or attack.

camouflage.label: Camouflage
camouflage.desc: The caster blends into the wilderness, becoming invisible for 1 hour. Only works outdoors. Making any aggressive action removes it.

thornyvines.label: Thorny Vines
thornyvines.desc: Choose an enemy within 10m, that creature must make a Strength Saving Throw or be Grappled by them and take 1d4 damage, they must then attempt the saving throw at the start of each turn to see if they break free or remain grappled and take a further 1d4 damage. Deals an additional 1d4 damage for each rank above 1.

calllightning.label: Call Lightning
calllightning.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within 10m, on hit the target suffers 1d6+SPI Energy damage and is Stunned. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

healingwind.label: Healing Wind
healingwind.desc: Heal a target within 1m for 1d6+SPI health. Increases by 1d6 for each rank above 2.

barkskin.label: Barkskin
barkskin.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m +1 armour and +1 magic reduction for 1 minute. Grants an additional +1 for each rank above 2.

eyesofthehawk.label: Eyes of the Hawk
eyesofthehawk.desc: Grant a friendly target Spirit attack on their next turn.

callanimal.label: Call Animal
callanimal.desc: Summon a temporary animal companion for 1 hour (Hawk, Wolf, Panther, Bear).

callhurricane.label: Call Hurricane
callhurricane.desc: Choose a target area 3m x 3m within range. All creatures in that range must make a Constitution Saving Throw or take 2d8+SPI Blunt damage and be knocked down. On save success they take half damage and are not knocked down. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

spiderform.label: Spider Form
spiderform.desc: Take the form of a small spider for 1 hour. While in spider form the caster is considered basically invisible.

regenerate.label: Regenerate
regenerate.desc: Grant regeneration to a friendly target within 10m for the duration. At the start of it's turn that character gains 2d4 health.

stoneskin.label: Stoneskin
stoneskin.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m Resistance to Blunt, Slashing and Piercing damage for the duration.

speedofthecheetah.label: Speed of the Cheetah
speedofthecheetah.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m Haste for the duration.

summonwind.label: Summon Wind
summonwind.desc: Call on the winds, granting you levitate off the ground for  1 hour.

charmanimal.label: Charm Animal
charmanimal.desc: Choose an animal within range to make a Charisma Saving Throw or be Charmed. The creature rolls with Advantage if it is in combat.

birdform.label: Bird Form
birdform.desc: Take the form of a small bird for 1 hour. While in bird form the caster can fly.

fly.label: Fly
fly.desc: You touch a willing creature, granting it a flying speed of 10m for the duration. For each rank above 3, the spell can affect one additional creature.

scry.label: Scry
scry.desc: Using a Scrying Gem, you can focus on a creature or location you are familiar with and be presented with a present vision of that target. If the target is a creature, it must make a Spirit Saving Throw to see whether it resists the scry.

treestride.label: Treestride
treestride.desc: Instantly transports the caster and up to 9 other people from one tree to another tree that the caster is aware of.

diamondskin.label: Diamondskin
diamondskin.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m Resistance to Arcane, Fire, Ice, Light, Dark, Energy and Mind damage for 1 minute.

revive.label: Revive
revive.desc: Choose a character to resurrect who has been dead for less than 1 minute. Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. The DC increases by 1 for each time the character has been previously resurrected (including failed attempts). Other characters may assist in various forms (making additional checks to lower the DC). Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

poisoncloud.label: Poison Cloud
poisoncloud.desc: Summon a cloud of poison at a target area of size 3m x 3m. All characters in the area must make a Constitution Saving Throw now and at the start of their turn or take 2d8+SPI Poison damage.

wolfform.label: Wolf Form
wolfform.desc: Take the form of a large wolf for 1 hour. While in wolf form the caster gains a +3 to Strength and Agility, has Haste, and rolls 1d8+STR for melee attack damage.

ankhofreversal.label: Ankh of Reversal
ankhofreversal.desc: Mark the friendly target, the next fatal damage they would take actually heals them for that amount instead.

treeform.label: Tree Form
treeform.desc: Take the form of a large tree for 1 hour. While in tree form the caster cannot move, but can still cast spells and gains Resistance to all damage types.

thunderstorm.label: Thunderstorm
thunderstorm.desc: Choose an area 3m x 3m within range to create a storm that you can maintain with Concentration for the duration. All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 5d8+SPI Energy damage. On save success they take half damage.

enhancemind.label: Enhance Mind
enhancemind.desc: Grant your target enhanced mind for the duration. That character has Advantage on all Intelligence/Charisma Checks for the duration.

wrackmind.label: Mind Stab
wrackmind.desc: Choose a creature within 10m, that creature must make an Intelligence Saving Throw or take 1d6+CHA Mind damage

lovesick.label: Lovesick
lovesick.desc: Choose a creature within 10m, that creature must make a Charisma Saving Throw or it will make any attacks against you with Disadvantage

charm.label: Charm
charm.desc: Choose a creature within 10m, that creature must make a Charisma Saving Throw (during combat it has Advantage) or it will be Charmed for the duration. It must then make another save at the end of each turn to see if it breaks free from the charm. When the effect ends, the creature knows it was charmed by you.
